description: This file implements the core operations of a UDP Echo Server object in a broadband management system, including functions to start ('engage') and stop ('cancel') the server.

classes.name: PBBHM_UDP_ECHOSRV_OBJECT
classes.description: Pointer to the UDP Echo Server object structure containing state variables and function pointers.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS BbhmUdpechoEngage(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Activates or engages the UDP Echo Server, setting its active state to true and initializing control flags.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS BbhmUdpechoCancel(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Cancels or deactivates the UDP Echo Server, stopping the server process and updating the active state.
